name: Emanuele Blasi
goal: Mi dedico all’imprenditoria e all’innovazione. Aiuto gli imprenditori a superare le sfide che gli si pongono davanti. Aiuto gli imprenditori a trovare la miglior soluzione e la giusta strategia per i loro progetti e a ottenere gli strumenti per continuare l’avventura in autonomia.
interests: Business and Industry, Culture, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Sport, Transport
euInitiatives:
High-Level Expert Group on Sustainable Finance

Action Plan: Financing Sustainable Growth - COM/2018/097 final

Report on accelerating clean energy innovation (2017/2084(INI))

Report on the proposal for a regulation of the European Parliament and of the Council repealing Regulation (EU) No 256/2014 of the European Parliament and of the Council concerning the notification to the Commission of investment projects in energy infrastructure within the European Union
